category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Org_AllowRevoke
preference.preference_description: Controls the revoke GDPR Consent facility on the User Settings dialog's Login panel. If this pref is set to true, a Teamcenter user can revoke their consent from this dialog if he/she had previously accepted the Consent. The default value is false (disabled).
